channel.title: Hades5 Come Have Fun
channel.description:
[center][url=http://hades5.net/index.php][img]http://hades5.net/Home/images/logo.png[/img][/url][/center] [center][size=18pt][url=http://hades5.net/index.php]Home Page[/url] - [url=http://hades5.net/index.php?action=forum]Forum[/url] - [url=http://hades5.net/index.php?action=accountman;area=create]Create an Account[/url] - [url=http://play.hades5.net/index.html]Webclient[/url] - [url=http://play.hades5.net/info.html]Client Download[/url] - [url=http://wiki.hades5.net]Wiki[/url][/size][/center]
[center][size=35pt][u]Why hades5?[/u][/size][/center]
With countless other choices of Runescape Private Servers, you could be thinking to yourself, "Why should I join hades5?" Let us tell you why. The server has been online for over two years, which is a great accomplishment for any server. Our server has been created from the ground up taking into account what a successful server needs, and with the feedback from our community regarding what they want, we've added their ideas into the server. We listen to the community and add their ideas if they’re good enough. We have two unique minigames: The Nex Games, a minigame required every run for access to Nex (with rewards such as Primal Armor and Heavysword); and Zombies! How long can you survive?!
We strive on account security, and have implemented recovery and account security measures for our players. These range from email recoveries to aid you in recovering your lost or stolen account, to the hades5 Account Defender which allows you to chose which devices may have access to your account. (This works similarly to the Jagex Account Guardian.) In-game, we have implemented a bank PIN system which will deter hackers from accessing your bank, should one ever gain access to your account. Furthermore, in the unlikely event of our database being compromised, your bank pin and account password are securely hashed and salted to ensure no one could ever use any information in our database against you or us.
[center]With all that in mind, why not come and see for yourself that we are the one for you? Join us today![/center]
[center]We are one of a kind. We are hades5.[/center]
[center][size=35pt][u]hades5 Features[/u][/size][/center]
[ul][li]Moparscape's #1 sponsored server[/li] [li]Powerbot's powerwars are now hosted on hades5![/li] [li]100% Working bank tabs[/li] [li]Searchable bank[/li] [li]Weekly staff hosted events[/li] [li]Clan Wars[/li] [li]Nomad[/li] [li]Ranked clan chat[/li] [li]Original Zombies mini-game![/li] [li]hades Account Defender (Account protection similar to Jagex Account Guardian)[/li] [li]Top 50 pkers in the past 24 hours[/li] [li]Torva, Pernix and Virtus with working effects.[/li] [li]Cool custom items, but not overdone (not too many)[/li] [li]In game bank pins[/li] [li]Resizable client.[/li] [li]Working Castle Wars.[/li] [li]Account Recovery system (website obviously, via email)[/li] [li]Tormented Demons[/li] [li]Godswords + specials[/li] [li]Very cool staff[/li] [li]Fully working overloads[/li] [li]Frequent updates[/li] [li]Instant donations system[/li] [li]High scores page [url=http://hades5.net/index.php?action=highscores]click here![/url][/li] [li]Corporal Beast with good drops[/li] [li]Christmas cracker drops (VERY rare)[/li] [li]Full dragon claws[/li] [li]100% skill capes[/li] [li]Dragonfire shield with real emote[/li] [li]Nice interface for commands that shows commands based on your rank (donor status)[/li] [li]Godwars[/li] [li]KBD[/li] [li]Barrows[/li] [li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Powerful 1Gbps dedicated servers with DDoS protection to ensure consistent uptime[/li][/ul]
[center][size=35pt][u]Screenshots[/u][/size][/center] [size=15pt][b]Bank Tabs[/b][/size]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/YTDVna7.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/xjoyyCy.png[/img][/center]
[size=15pt][b]Bank Searching[/b][/size]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/TzLzWSl.png[/img][/center]
[size=15pt][b]Castle Wars[/b][/size]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ubsYkpK.png[/img][/center]
[size=15pt][b]Zombies Minigame[/b][/size]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/QX6ICqt.png[/img][/center]
[size=15pt][b]Perfect Clan Chat[/b][/size]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/PB6Eu9q.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/MiVjefO.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Hades5 Come Have Fun
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

Tom:

Your yellow font on my screen isn’t even readable. It just looks like a yellow line of cryptic symbols that you’d expect to see in a film orientated around ancient Egypt. Goodluck though

I did it to help people that study Ancient Egypt. Seriously though, this was made for a different forum theme where it was legible, and I just c+p’d it.

Combatx:

Great, Good luck in the future!

As long as things go as they have for the past 2 years, I’ll be alright, thanks. =)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Combatx Combatx
item.description:

[center][/center]

[center][size=35pt]Why hades5?[/size][/center]

With countless other choices of Runescape Private Servers, you could be thinking to yourself, “Why should I join hades5?” Let us tell you why. The server has been online for over two years, which is a great accomplishment for any server. Our server has been created from the ground up taking into account what a successful server needs, and with the feedback from our community regarding what they want, we’ve added their ideas into the server. We listen to the community and add their ideas if they’re good enough. We have two unique minigames: The Nex Games, a minigame required every run for access to Nex (with rewards such as Primal Armor and Heavysword); and Zombies! How long can you survive?!

We strive on account security, and have implemented recovery and account security measures for our players. These range from email recoveries to aid you in recovering your lost or stolen account, to the hades5 Account Defender which allows you to chose which devices may have access to your account. (This works similarly to the Jagex Account Guardian.) In-game, we have implemented a bank PIN system which will deter hackers from accessing your bank, should one ever gain access to your account. Furthermore, in the unlikely event of our database being compromised, your bank pin and account password are securely hashed and salted to ensure no one could ever use any information in our database against you or us.

[center]With all that in mind, why not come and see for yourself that we are the one for you? Join us today![/center]

[center]We are one of a kind. We are hades5.[/center]
